tech_news.description: Want to use all the C’tan shards at once? Of course you do!

tech_news.title: Ugreen is now selling an AI NAS with more RAM than my desktop - The Verge
tech_news.description: Ugreen’s iDX6011 and iDX6011 Pro are its first AI-equipped network attached storage (NAS) devices, with up to 64GB of RAM and desktop PC prices.

tech_news.title: No, Microsoft didn’t rebrand Office to Microsoft 365 Copilot - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft’s Office website is confusing the internet. Despite lots of posts, Microsoft hasn’t rebranded Office to Microsoft 365 Copilot.

tech_news.title: ‘Autofocus’ glasses can change their lenses in real time - CNN
tech_news.description: Finnish eyewear company IXI is gearing up to launch smart glasses that look just like ordinary spectacles, but are able to “autofocus” based on the perceived needs of the wearer.

tech_news.title: Nvidia’s GeForce Now is getting native Linux and Fire TV apps - The Verge
tech_news.description: Nvidia is launching new GeForce Now apps for Linux and Amazon’s Fire TV devices. It’s also adding flight control support to its streaming service.

tech_news.title: Alienware Teases Portfolio Expansion - Alienware Arena

tech_news.description: New chips launch "this month," targeting high-end ultraportable PCs.
